features: Anti Colic. Designed to reduce colic, gas, and spit up.
Only 4 pieces – Easy to Clean. Easy to Use. Seals Tight.
Soft silicone Patented (No. D954,280) Duo-Flo nipple for a secure latch and easy transition from mom's breast.
Easy Grip! Best Bottle to use to Transition to Cups.
All Avima products are made to the highest safety standards and are free of BPA, PVC, phthalates and polycarbonate.
body.description: Designed to reduce colic, gas, and spit up. Our Anti-Colic bottles were designed to help your baby's feeding experience. The patented Duo-Flo nipples have valves that flex and adjust the flow of milk according to your baby’s feeding pace, so your baby can drink without interruption or nipple collapse. This minimizes the air going into your baby’s stomach which can reduce colic, gas and spit-up. 3 Pack of 8 oz. bottles with Stage 2 (medium flow) nipples. Only 4 pieces – Easy to Clean. Easy to Use. Seals Tight with No Leaks.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Our Safety Promise Our products are safe and durable. We are proud that all Avima products meet or exceed international safety standards. Designed to reduce colic, gas, and spit up. Our Anti-Colic bottles were designed to help your baby's feeding experience. The patented Duo-Flo nipples have valves that flex and adjust the flow of milk according to your baby’s feeding pace, so your baby can drink without interruption or nipple collapse. This minimizes the air going into your baby’s stomach which can reduce colic, gas and spit-up. 3 Pack of 8 oz. bottles with Stage 2 (medium flow) nipples. Only 4 pieces – Easy to Clean. Easy to Use. Seals Tight with No Leaks.

Natural Latch Our natural shape nipple closely mimics the feel of a breast to help ensure a secure latch. Multiple Flows Different flow rates are available so you can use the same bottle as your baby grows. Easy to Clean Only 4 Pieces – Easy to Assemble and Clean! Seals Tight with No Leaks!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars 8 Oz, resistant material...
reviews.reviewText: The design of these bottles fit well for easy grip.They come complete, the teapots are included and the material is strong. At the bottom it has some dinosaur designs that may disappear over time. Each bottle has a capacity of 8 ounces =250 milligrams.They are a comfortable proposition for children and are BPA free. In addition to having these advantages, they are also anti-colic, which means that they have an opening which helps the air not to get trapped inside the bottle and the child breathes in air and this causes colic.They have a medium flow nipple and are designed for infants 3 months and older.Something I notice is that washing takes longer than traditional bottles.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Different but Good!
reviews.reviewText: So I like the idea of these baby bottles because they are easier for a baby to hold. They're pink and have a cute cat on one side. They feel fairly durable. My only complaints would be that the cap is hard to remove, and they are hard to clean. If you rinse them right after use it's fine but if you were to leave any formula or milk in them for a longer period of time before washing its hard to clean the bottom of the bottle for obvious reasons. Otherwise they are nice bottles.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Three pink baby bottles
reviews.reviewText: These three pink bottles comes beautifully packaged. The window on the front of the box shows you what you get inside, and that is uniquely shaped bottles which allow the baby to easily hold them. Each has a cute cat head picture on the front too.These are for my granddaughter-to-be, but with a medium flow nipple, it will be a little bit of time before she can test it. What I fan tell you is that the bottles' covers are super secure - I had to ask my husband to open one for me. But that reassures that knocking a bottle over means it won't leak. The plastic is a nice thickness too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The wide neck design and medium flow silicone nipples make feeding a breeze. The anti-colic feature ensures a smooth, fuss-free experience for my little one, reducing discomfort. The easy-grip design is not only practical but also aids in my baby's independent feeding journey.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These bottles are nice in that they're easy for little hands to hold, but the shape makes mixing anything in them and cleaning them very difficult. Formula ends up chunking or full of bubbles from shaking and cleaning them with any type of brush is tedious.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Design is easy to hold but difficult to clean.
reviews.reviewText: I ordered this set of (3) 8oz baby bottles because they have anti-colic nipples, which the new mom in our family prefers. The overall design was appealing because they're easy for a baby to hold once old enough to. However, that same design makes them very difficult to thoroughly clean.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I purchased these baby bottles for my little one. I like the design of the bottle making it easier for your baby to grasp. I like the flow of the bottle nipple lowering the chances of your baby developing gas or colic. The materials are sturdy and durable. Excellent quality for the price. Plus the bottle is easy to clean and assembling the parts together.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Easy grip bottles
reviews.reviewText: These bottles are definitely easy to grip for older babies. The packaging states for 3-6 months. They are made of plastic and come with a lid to help prevent leaks. At first glance I wasn’t sure what it was about them that was supposed to make them anti-colic, so I read further down in the description. It states that the nipples on the bottle have valves that flex and adjust the flow of milk as your baby drinks.
